meanings.definition: Having a pleasant taste or smell.
meanings.sent1: The soup was savorous, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The bakery was filled with the savorous aroma of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent3: The savorous cupcake danced on my taste buds, making me want more.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as savorous as a sweet melody.
meanings.sent5: The savorous strawberries burst with flavor in my mouth.

meanings.definition: Enjoyable or pleasing to the senses.
meanings.sent1: The garden was a savorous place to relax and unwind.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted a savorous picture in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The movie was so savorous that I didn't want it to end.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as savorous as a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The savorous music filled the room with joy.
